measurements.description: Measurement data for a given initial substrate concentration.

stoichiometry.description: Define whether "substrate" or "product" concentration was measured.

data_conc_unit.description: Molar concentration unit of the measured data.

time.description: Time array corresponding to time-course data.

inhibitors.description: Inhibitor data, if applied to the reaction.

EnzymeKinetics.docstring: Base class, dealing with measurement data of an enzyme kinetics assay.

initial_substrate_conc.description: Initial substrate concentration of the measurement.

inhibitor_conc_unit.description: Inhibitor concentration in the reaction, if applied.

data.description: One or multiple time-course concentration data arrays.

inhibitor.description: Inhibitor instance, of the respective inhibitor applied to the reaction.

Measurement.docstring: A Measurement object contains information about the applied enzyme concentration and one or multiple time-course concentration measurements. Additionally, the initial substrate concentration should be specified. This is neccessary to derive the substrate concentration for the modeling process. If an inhibitor was applied to the measurement, its concentration and the respective conetration unit can be specified to account for inhibition in kinetic modeling.

name.description: Name or ID of the inhibitor

conconcentration_unit.description: Name or ID of the inhibitor

Inhibitor.docstring: Parameters of the inhibitor, if inhibitor was applied to the enzyme reaction.

values.description: Time-course data of an individual reaction.

Series.docstring: Time-course data of an individual reaction.
